titleHead: [CY] Hearing support - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: [CY] Do you need any support at the hearing?
supportCanBeArranged: [CY] Support can be arranged, such as an interpreter, hearing loop or disabled access. You
bringYourOwn: [CY] bring your own interpreter to the hearing.

arrangements.label: [CY] Select whether you need support at the hearing or not
arrangements.yes: [CY] Yes, I need support at the hearing
arrangements.no: [CY] No, I don't need support at the hearing

error.required: [CY] You need to tell us whether you need support at the hearing. Select either yes or no.

arrangements.question: [CY] Do you want us to make arrangements for your hearing
